body_html:
Total memory: 7.92GiB
Free memory: 190.31MiB

Something is already consuming all your GPU memory. Run nvidia-smi to see what's going on, you have no memory left.

If you are trying to run 2 TensorFlow codes in parallel, you will want to change the Session command to this:

config = tf.ConfigProto(log_device_placement=False, allow_soft_placement=True)
config.gpu_options.allow_growth=True
sess = tf.Session(config=config)

This way, TensorFlow won't allocate all of the memory for a single process.

body:
> Total memory: 7.92GiB
> Free memory: 190.31MiB

Something is already consuming all your GPU memory. Run `nvidia-smi` to see what's going on, you have no memory left.

If you are trying to run 2 TensorFlow codes in parallel, you will want to change the Session command to this:
```
config = tf.ConfigProto(log_device_placement=False, allow_soft_placement=True)
config.gpu_options.allow_growth=True
sess = tf.Session(config=config)
```

This way, TensorFlow won't allocate all of the memory for a single process.
